[Home](https://sansabatexas.com)

The City of San Saba is committed to fostering a strong, vibrant community by providing transparent leadership, reliable services, and opportunities for civic engagement. Our local government works to enhance the well-being of residents, support economic growth, and preserve the historic and natural beauty of our town.

### How San Saba Runs: Leadership, Services, and Community Support

San Saba’s city government is made up of dedicated leaders, departments, and volunteers who ensure the city operates smoothly and efficiently.

* **[City Hall](https://sansabatexas.com/city-hall/)**
  – The central hub for city administration, providing essential municipal services, resident support, and information on city operations.
* – A network of advisory groups composed of engaged citizens who help guide policies and initiatives on various city matters, from planning and development to beautification efforts.

Our government operates with a commitment to service, collaboration, and community-driven progress. Whether you’re a resident looking for city resources, a business owner seeking support, or a visitor exploring our town, San Saba’s leadership is here to serve you.
